title: Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail: Photos & Multimedia
body: Photos & Multimedia       Learn more about the Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail by watching our introductory video. You’ll find lots of images of the trail at www.smithtrail.net. And you’ll even find tips on taking and sharing your own photographs as you enjoy your adventures along the John Smith trail.                    GeoCaching on the Trail   1 Photos  Captain John Smith Chesapeake NHT Geotrail          Experience History   1 Photos  Reenactors and living historians can really "capture the moment"          Beautiful Chesapeake   2 Photos  Over 3000 miles of trail is a recipe for some of the nation's most beautiful landscapes            Maps   1 Photos  For more than 400 years people have been mapping the Chesapeake Bay
